title: 39. Cerave, Chin Pimples, Bare Minerals, and Should You Go Solo?
description:
Hi Roomies!! It's another Q+A style solo eppy.

This episode covers the biggest tips for succeeding as a new estie including:

- going solo after school versus working for someone else

- finding a mentor

- treating chin/ jawline pimples

- my thoughts on Cerave

- mineral makeup + Bare Minerals

- pre-going out skincare + cleansing 

You can shop my Glymed store here

or DM me on Instagram to purchase IS Clinical

MY SOCIAL MEDIA:

Tess' Instagram @myestytessa
